com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.autodownload

Class PlaylistConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.autodownload.PlaylistConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlaylistConfig
    public class PlaylistConfig extends java.lang.Object implements IPlaylistConfig
    A class to store the resulting settings from a PlaylistConfigBuilder. This is required for creation of a new playlist.
